recommendations: “I've had the pleasure of working with Apeksha since she joined Third Bridge back in 2020. What stands out about her is her remarkable adaptability and versatility. Apeksha can seamlessly transition into any role and make it her own in record time. Her exceptional interpersonal skills allowed her to build outstanding client relationships, and she consistently goes above and beyond the call of duty. Apeksha's work ethic is truly exceptional. I'm excited to see the incredible things she'll accomplish in her career. She's a talent with immense potential and a bright future ahead.” Show less

“I have known Apeksha since the time she joined Third Bridge, back in 2020! She has consistently been one of our top performers at an Asia / Global level and our go-to person for any new / priority clients. Her client servicing ability is par excellence, which enables her to develop deep-rooted relationships with her client users. I truly believe that Apeksha can step into any role with ease and make the role her own in no time. She most definitely is a rare talent, who can turbocharge the growth of any organisation she works with!” Show less
